item.title: Comment on The economic powers of the HHS secretary by Counting down for Jan 20th…
item.description:
Whilst I’m sure come inauguration, when the rubber meets the road, some thinking may happen, let’s not kid ourselves that anything like “a serious ponder” is going on at the moment:

It’s about fealty, preferably with an added dose of self-humiliation at renouncing earlier criticism, at the feet of the king.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/11/the-economic-powers-of-the-hhs-secretary.html?commentID=160836955

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/11/the-economic-powers-of-the-hhs-secretary.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=the-economic-powers-of-the-hhs-secretary

Votes: 83⬆ 19⬇
item.dc:creator: Counting down for Jan 20th…

item.title: Comment on The Impact of Divorce Laws on the Equilibrium in the Marriage Market by MikeP
item.description:
For better, for worse
For richer, for poorer
In sickness and in health
To unravel the underlying mechanisms
I estimate a novel life-cycle equilibrium model

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/11/the-impact-of-divorce-laws-on-the-equilibrium-in-the-marriage-market.html?commentID=160836829
